meaningMnemonic: You see a <radical>soul</radical> on a <radical>cross</radical> covered in <radical>flowers</radical> with <radical>shellfish</radical> at its feet and you suddenly <kanji>resent</kanji> them. It's not like you want to be the one up there on the cross, but so many people left flowers and shellfish for them. It should have been you...
readingMnemonic: You realize you <kanji>resent</kanji> them because it looks like they're having <reading>fun</reading> (ふん). You aren't having fun, and you wanna be! How dare they have fun when you aren't!
